full_summary:
### North Roundhead Reconstruction at the Canso Canal

#### Title and Reference

*   **English Title:** North Roundhead Reconstruction at the Canso Canal
*   **French Title:** Reconstruction du mur à tête ronde nord au canal de Canso
*   **Reference Number:** WS3736868965-Doc3736999286
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3736868965
*   **Amendment Number:** 1

#### Tender Details

##### Announcement and Closing Dates
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-11-04
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-21T14:00:00 (Please note that closing time has been revised, and submissions must be made by 1400 EST on the closing date. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.)

#### Contract Details

##### Expected Contract Dates
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None

##### Contract Status
*   **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

#### Goods and Services

##### UNSPSC Codes
*   *30121704: Concrete Slab
*   *72100000: Building and facility maintenance and repair services
*   *72140000: Heavy construction services
*   *72152700: Concrete installation and repair services

#### Procurement Category and Notice Type
*   **Procurement Category:** CNST
*   **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)

#### Tender Evaluation
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements
*   **Trade Agreements:** Accords Commerce (Canadian Free Trade Agreement, or CFTA)

#### Contact Information
*   **Contact Person:** Dwyer, Alexandria (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14550380?extsite=MTQ1NTAzODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Tender Description and Details
This procurement is for the North Roundhead Reconstruction at the Canso Canal in Nova Scotia. The scope of work includes furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials to complete the project. This may include:
